titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at St. Mary-le-Bow before the Lord Mayor, and court of aldermen, and citizens of London, on Wednesday the 28th of April, a day appointed by His Majesty's proclamation for a general and publick fast by Lilly Butler ...
titleStmt.author: Butler, Lilly.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
